item.title: EP 198 - Attack Of The Lone Pine Devils!
item.itunes:title: Attack Of The Lone Pine Devils!
item.description:
Today we start off as we travel to an Oklahoma Girl Scout camp to investigate a horrendous crime, and then we go for a hike up Lone Pine Mountain to fight off some winged devils!

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

12 Facts About The Unsolved Oklahoma Girl Scout Murders

https://www.ranker.com/list/facts-about-oklahoma-girl-scout-murders/cat-mcauliffe

 

Jury acquits suspect in Girl Scout Murders

https://news.google.com/newspapers?nid=888&dat=19790331&id=zc5aAAAAIBAJ&sjid=QXwDAAAAIBAJ&pg=5628,6229620

 

Minister claims he saw killers in '77 Camp Scott murder case

https://www.tulsaworld.com/archives/minister-claims-he-saw-killers-in-camp-scott-murder-case/article_56adcbcf-d2e4-5f02-9945-88a950b58c6b.html

 

Lone Pine Ghosts

http://www.weirdca.com/location.php?location=293

 

Lone Pine Mountain Devil

http://www.weirdca.com/location.php?location=292

 

Lone Pine Mountain Devil

https://cryptidz.fandom.com/wiki/Lone_Pine_Mountain_Devil

4 Times Iceland Made Major Decisions Based On Elves

https://allthatsinteresting.com/iceland-elves

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

 

------------------------------------------------

 

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018
